packets.title: Design state versioning schema and migration contract
packets.scope: Define schema_version field semantics, migration log event format, and backward compatibility rules. Output: docs/orchestration/state-versioning-contract.md with versioning rules and migration protocol.

packets.title: Implement state version detection and migration framework
packets.scope: Add schema_version to wbs-state.json structure, implement migration registry in wbs_common.py, add version check on state load. Output: working version detection with migration hooks.

packets.title: Add migration logging and constitutional compliance
packets.scope: Ensure migrations are logged per Article II Section 6, add migration events to log array, validate no silent modifications. Output: migrations logged as governance events with timestamps and agent 'system'.

packets.title: Create migration test suite and validation
packets.scope: Write tests for version upgrades, rollback safety, and log integrity. Output: tests/test_state_versioning.py with comprehensive migration test coverage.

packets.title: Add SSE endpoint to wbs_server.py
packets.scope: Implement /api/events SSE endpoint that streams state change events. Output: working SSE endpoint with connection management and heartbeat.

packets.title: Implement state change event emitter
packets.scope: Add event emission to claim/done/fail/reset transitions in engine.py. Events pushed to SSE clients. Output: all lifecycle transitions emit events to connected clients.

packets.title: Build real-time dashboard auto-refresh
packets.scope: Update dashboard HTML/JS to consume SSE events and auto-refresh packet status, progress metrics, and activity log. Output: dashboard updates without manual refresh.

packets.title: Add live Mermaid dependency graph visualization
packets.scope: Integrate Mermaid.js into dashboard, render dependency graph with real-time status colors (pending/in_progress/done/failed). Output: interactive dependency graph on dashboard.

packets.title: Design tag dependency contract and expansion rules
packets.scope: Define tag syntax (tag:name), packet tagging schema, expansion semantics, and transparency requirements. Output: docs/orchestration/tag-dependencies-contract.md with examples and edge cases.

packets.title: Implement tag index and dependency resolver
packets.scope: Add tags field to packet schema, build tag index on WBS load, implement tag-to-packet-ID expansion. Output: DependencyGate can resolve tag:frontend to explicit packet IDs.

packets.title: Add tag expansion logging and transparency
packets.scope: Log tag expansions to explicit IDs during WBS init/load, store expanded dependencies in state for auditability. Output: tag expansions visible in logs and state file.

packets.title: Update CLI commands and validation for tags
packets.scope: Support tag syntax in add-dep command, validate tag references during WBS validation, update graph command to show tag relationships. Output: full CLI support for tag-based dependencies.

packets.title: Draft constitutional amendment for hook boundaries
packets.scope: Analyze hook system against Articles I (scope), IV (protected resources), and VI (human authority). Output: docs/orchestration/hook-system-constitutional-review.md with amendment proposal or rejection rationale.

packets.title: Implement capability-based claim suggestion (advisory only)
packets.scope: Add claim-suggest command that analyzes packet required_capabilities against agent profiles and recommends best match. Output: python3 .governance/wbs_cli.py claim-suggest <id> returns ranked agent recommendations.

packets.title: Design skill-based hook permissions model
packets.scope: If ORCH-013 approves hooks, design permission model based on .governance/skill-permissions.json pattern. Output: docs/orchestration/hook-permissions-design.md with sandbox rules.

packets.title: Implement hook execution framework (if approved)
packets.scope: Add hooks array to packet schema, implement hook executor with sandbox constraints, log all hook executions. Output: working hook system with constitutional compliance.

packets.title: Update governance documentation for new features
packets.scope: Update AGENTS.md, CLAUDE.md, architecture.md, and governance-workflow-codex.md with new commands and capabilities. Output: all governance docs reflect new features.

packets.title: Update templates to use new tag-based dependencies
packets.scope: Refactor templates/wbs-codex-minimal.json and wbs-codex-full.json to demonstrate tag usage. Output: templates use tags where appropriate with clear examples.

packets.title: Create orchestration improvements demo and test suite
packets.scope: Build end-to-end demo showing state versioning, real-time dashboard, tags, and claim-suggest. Output: tests/test_orchestration_enhancements.py and demo script.

packets.title: Drift assessment and closeout for orchestration improvements
packets.scope: Review all implemented features against planned scope, document any drift, record residual risks. Output: docs/orchestration/drift-assessment-orchestration-2026-02.md with closeout report.

packets.title: Bootstrap and on-demand install tooling

packets.title: Validation, metrics, and closeout

packets.title: Optional-feature fallback smoke tests

packets.title: Remove Redundant Files and Directories
packets.scope: Prune empty directories from removed legacy routes, an orphaned core directory, and undocumented templates.
packets.purpose: Prune empty directories from removed legacy routes, an orphaned core directory, and undocumented templates.
required_actions: Delete empty directories under templates/ai-substrate/app/ (wbs, graph, terminal, audit, settings, risks).

Delete undocumented template fragments under templates/ (wbs-bugfix.json, wbs-critical-delivery.json, wbs-feature.json, wbs-infra-governed.json, wbs-migration.json, wbs-refactor.json, wbs-scaffold-build.json).
validation_checks: Ensure no active files were accidentally deleted in these paths.
Ensure templates/wbs-codex-minimal.json and wbs-codex-full.json remain untouched.
exit_criteria: The file system reflects the deprecation-inventory and docs/wbs-template-profiles.md.

packets.title: Remove Redundant Root Directories and Update Tests
packets.scope: Delete substrate/, .codex/, root lib/, and root app/ directories after retargeting Python structural tests.
packets.purpose: Provide a clean project root by removing legacy folders and redundant clones.
validation_checks: python -m unittest discover tests passes successfully
exit_criteria: The root directory is free of app, substrate, lib, and .codex

packets.title: Historical Data and Report Purge
packets.scope: Delete all obsolete migration tracking documents, archive logs, and outdated delivery reports from docs/ and reports/.
packets.purpose: Give new clone-and-own developers a clean slate by removing the Substrate team's specific migration history.
required_actions: Delete purely historical rollout plans, logs, and snapshot JSONs
Retain essential architectural/governance documentation (like docs/architecture.md and ontology)
validation_checks: Repository size and clutter are visibly reduced
exit_criteria: docs/codex-migration and reports/archive are pruned or removed completely.

packets.title: One-Off Scripts Audit
packets.scope: Audit the 47 files in scripts/ and delete defunct tools, migration scripts, and orphaned bash utilities.
packets.purpose: Reduce scripting clutter and centralize operations inside the governance CLI or modern NPM scripts.
required_actions: Identify and delete scripts belonging to Removed features (e.g., ttyd terminal, phase5 migration)
Document the purpose of remaining essential scripts
validation_checks: Remaining scripts are actively executed or referenced by CI/CD or governance
exit_criteria: Obsolete shell scripts have been deleted from the repo.

packets.title: Orphan Backend Import Analysis
packets.scope: Search src/app/ for unreferenced Python modules and delete them.
packets.purpose: Remove legacy backend logic modules that were decoupled and migrated to the NextJS frontend.
required_actions: Grep codebase for imports of modules in src/app/ (e.g. analytics, proposals, audit, risk_register)
If a module has no downstream consumers outside of unit tests, trace the dependencies
Propose module deletion and delete the identified python files
validation_checks: .governance/wbs_server.py and wbs_cli.py continue to function without errors
exit_criteria: Dead python application code is removed.

packets.title: Test Suite Dissection
packets.scope: Audit tests/ and remove tests for deprecated or orphaned backend logic.
packets.purpose: Remove test scaffolding that artificially keeps dead backend Python code alive.
required_actions: Evaluate tests/ for files matching removed src/app/ logic
Ensure the test suite runs clean (accounting for known Windows sub-process flakiness)
validation_checks: python -m unittest discover tests continues to run without missing module imports
exit_criteria: Dead tests have been purged to improve CI speeds and cloneability.

packets.title: Next.js Route Simplification
packets.scope: Audit templates/ai-substrate/app/ routes and remove unlinked placeholder pages.
packets.purpose: Trim the boilerplate frontend to only pages explicitly wired in the navigation or documentation.
required_actions: Cross-reference routes in templates/ai-substrate/app/ against Sidebar navigation links
Identify and delete placeholder dummy routes
Ensure Next.js builds successfully after trimming
validation_checks: npm run build (if applicable) does not fail on missing routes
exit_criteria: The frontend template contains only structurally significant UI demonstrations.

packets.title: Remove Heavy Dependencies and Rogue Clones
packets.scope: Delete node_modules, .next build caches, and the unremovable substrate/ clone directory.
packets.purpose: Eliminate 95% of the repository's file count (node_modules) and recover ~1GB of disk space.
required_actions: Write a robust Python script to handle Windows MAX_PATH limitation deletions
validation_checks: Repository file count is drastically reduced
exit_criteria: Node modules, build caches, and nested clones are completely removed.

packets.title: Git History Garbage Collection
packets.scope: Run aggressive git garbage collection to compress the .git directory.
packets.purpose: Shrink the heavily bloated .git folder caused by recent mass deletions.
